antiSpamFilter

Class InterfaceTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • antiSpamFilter.InterfaceTest

  • public class InterfaceTest
extends java.lang.Object
    This class houses several tests pertaining to the Graphical User Interface.

    Several tests make use of a Thread.sleep() function to give Swing some time to update whatever values it has to in order for the test to make sense.

    Do not instantiate this class if you don't know what you're doing!

    Author:
    pvmpa-iscteiulpt, afgos-iscteiulpt

      void generateButton()
      Checks if values of FP and FN are changed after clicking "generate" button The files are choosed by orde: rules, spam, ham.

      Tests if Auto Save Button saves information on automatic interface Rules path must be choosen.

      Tests if Ham path is blank after canceling the change, "cancel" must be pressed.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InterfaceTest

        public InterfaceTest()

    • Method Detail

      • testTestButton

        public void testTestButton()
        Tests if the Test button in the Manual Implementation works properly when no rules.cf/spam.log/ham.log are provided. It shouldn't have any effect on the FP/FN counters.

      • testTestButton2

        public void testTestButton2()
        Tests if the Test button in the Manual Implementation works properly when rules.cf/spam.log/ham.log are provided. The FP/FN counters must change.

      • testManualSaveButton

        public void testManualSaveButton()
        Tests the rules/weights saving function by comparing the saved files with the information in the interface's text areas. They should hold the same information.

      • testChangeRules

        public void testChangeRules()
        Tests whether changing the path to a correct Rules file does anything or not. The path to rules.cf should change.

      • testCancelChangeRules

        public void testCancelChangeRules()
        Tests whether NOT changing the path to the Rules file while it's empty does anything or not. The path to rules.cf should not change and/or end the program in a catastrophic manner.

      • testChangeRules_Failure

        public void testChangeRules_Failure()
        Tests whether the program can handle the user choosing the wrong rules.cf file. The program should toss an error prompt at the user and not change the path to the file.

      • testChangeHam

        public void testChangeHam()
        Tests whether changing the path to ham.log does anything. The user should provide a correct path. The path to Ham should change.

      • testCancelChangeHam

        public void testCancelChangeHam()
        Tests if Ham path is blank after canceling the change, "cancel" must be pressed.

      • testChangeSpam

        public void testChangeSpam()
        Tests if spam path is changed after clicking "change" button Spam file must be choosed.

      • testCancelChangeSpam

        public void testCancelChangeSpam()
        Tests if Spam path is blank after canceling the change, "cancel" must be pressed.

      • generateButton

        public void generateButton()
        Checks if values of FP and FN are changed after clicking "generate" button The files are choosed by orde: rules, spam, ham.

      • testAutoSaveButton

        public void testAutoSaveButton()
        Tests if Auto Save Button saves information on automatic interface Rules path must be choosen.
